title: Wurz $24.95 (32 variants)
content:
**Hello Typophiles!**  
--------------------------------------------------  
We are proud to announce our new release!  
--------------------------------------------------

[**"Wurz"** by Vicente Lamónaca:](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414114723/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/tipotype/wurz/?refby=tipotype)

Best Regards  
 [**TipoType.com**](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414114723/http:/www.tipotype.com/)
author: ferfolio_2

comments.content:
The typeface and font is nice - but the name, in English, sounds like WORSE - the opposite of BETTER. Not very appealing, unfortunately.  
 - Herb
Awww... I was hoping you'd come up with a case When Wurz Is Better.
